resources.string:
"Welcome to he official OFFICEBALL score keeper Android application
The OFFICCEBALL It is a sport of skill played in offices around the world when there is not much work.
This sport consists of throwing a ball of paper to a trash can from the workstation.
Each basket counts one point (three if the boss is in the office).
Be careful, if the boss catch you, you to lose five points, and if he does more than once you could lose something more .........
